Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    A class that implements a member of the social network. It represents, in fact, a vertex in a graph. Implements DFS and BFS, which are used in the class Network for further use. Uses ArrayList as a data structure for the users.

    User and Network are based on a HAS-A relationship. More specifically, the class Network has a list of User objects, on which it bases its operations. Inheritance would not be suitable in this context.

    Author:
    Theodor Stoican

      User(int ID, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a user with the id "ID" and the name "name", with an initial empty list of friends.

    • Method Detail

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(User u)

        This method is used for adding a friend of a specific user, while keeping the list of friends sorted.

        Parameters:
        u - a user to be added as friend

      • removeFriend

        public boolean removeFriend(User u)

        This method removes the friend u from the list of user this and returns a boolean value, according to the succes of the operation.

        Parameters:
        u - a user to be removed
        Returns:
        true, if it is was removed and false, if either the list is empty or the user does not belong to the list

      • removeSelfFromFriends

        public void removeSelfFromFriends()

        A method that is used to unfriend two users. The logic is the following:the user this will delete itself from all of his friends and, afterwards, it will be deleted itself from the list of users.

        Parameters:
        no - parameters required

      • DFS

        public void DFS(java.util.ArrayList<User> visited,
       java.util.ArrayList<User> connectedComp)

        This method does a DFS traversal, starting with the user this.

        Parameters:
        visited - an array of users, which marks the users which were visited so far
        connectedComp - an array that stores the users who belong to a certain community

      • BFS

        public void BFS(int index,
       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> distances,
       java.util.ArrayList<User> community)

        This method does a BFS traversal, starting with the user this.

        Parameters:
        index - an integer which is used to map the list of friends with the vector of visited
